fifteenpuzzle.heuristics

Class ManhattanDistanceNaive

  • java.lang.Object
    • fifteenpuzzle.heuristics.ManhattanDistanceNaive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HeuristicInterface

    public class ManhattanDistanceNaive
extends java.lang.Object
implements HeuristicInterface
    ManhattanDistanceNaive Class. This class is called naive because is dum enough to calculate Manhattan Distanceevery for hole puzzle every time when movement is done. This heuristic is admissable so it never over estimate distance. Alone this is little weak function but it can make IDA* to solve average random puzzle mostly in a minute.

        public int calculate(Puzzle puzzle)
